data.description:
Get Closer to the World of Cats!

"Neko Atsume Purrfect Kitty Collector" is a simulation game featuring a whopping 46 different types of cats.
In this game, you can do more than just leisurely observe free-spirited cats; you can play with them using a cat teaser, stroke their bellies, and even pick them up for a cuddle.
At the delightful yard location, home to uniquely charming cats like "Calico cat," "Odd-eyed cat," and "Big fat cat," you are sure to encounter your purrfect feline companion.
Enjoy the uninterrupted "Life with Cats" to the fullest.

changelog.change_log:
<English>
- Added a new Goodie.
   Tent (Nature)

 -"Ms. Fortune" has appeared in the yard.

<日本語>
- 新しいグッズを追加しました
- にわさきに"こいこいさん"が登場するようになりました

<English>
- Added a new Goodies.
 　Kick Toy (Bunny)
 　Kick Toy (Sea Bream)

<日本語>
- 新しいグッズを追加しました
   けりぐるみ(うさぎ)
   けりぐるみ(鯛)

<English>
■VR 
 - Added a new Goodies.
　Shopping Box (Large)
　Cardboard (Flat)

<日本語>
■VR
・新しいグッズを追加しました
　ダンボール（みかん）
　ダンボール（平）

<English>
 - Added a new goodie "Pancake Cushion".
 -"Mr. Meowgi" has appeared in the yard.
 
<日本語>
 ・新しいグッズ "ケーキクッション" を追加しました
 ・にわさきに"おさむらいさん"が登場するようになりました

<English>
■VR 
 - Added a new goodie "Cushion (Lemon)".
 - Added a new goodie "Cushion (Orange)".
 - Added a new goodie "Giant Cushion.
　Giant Cushion is a special toy that Tubbs can play with.
 - The probability of drawing for rare cats has been revised.
　The appearance rate of rare cats that have not yet appeared once has been greatly increased.

■MR 
 -Whiteshadow has started appearing outside the window.
　However, Whiteshadow does not stay in the same place; it repeatedly moves and leaves.

<日本語>
�VR
・新しいグッズ "クッション(レモン)" を追加しました
・新しいグッズ "クッション(オレンジ)" を追加しました
・新しいグッズ "ビッグクッション" を追加しました
　ビッグクッションはまんぞくさんが遊ぶことができる特別なグッズです。
・レアねこの抽選確率を修正しました
　まだ一度も出現していないレアねこの出現率を大幅にアップしました。

■MR 
・しのぶさんが窓から出現するようになりました。
　ただし、しのぶさんは同じ場所に留まらず、移動したり立ち去ったりを繰り返します。

<English>
■VR 
 - Added new motion for cats.
 - Added a new item "Robot Vacuum".

■MR 
 - It is now possible to set up windows.
　 Please try from the 'MR settings' or 'device settings' within the game.
 - The description of Decors has been corrected.


<日本語>
■VR
・ねこの新しいモーションを追加しました。
・新しいグッズ "お掃除ロボット" を追加しました

■MR 
・窓の設定が可能になりました。
　ゲーム内のMR設定、またはデバイス設定からお試しください。
・インテリアの説明文を修正しました。

<English>
 - A new cat has been added.
　The new cat is very good at hiding. When you put down a specific snack, it will appear somewhere in the yard.
  The new cat may be hiding on a shelf, on a fence, or in a closet. We hope you will look for the cat.
 
- Added a new goodie "Antique Chair".

<日本語>
・新しいねこを追加しました
　新しいねこは隠れるのがとても上手です。特定のご飯を置くと、庭先のどこかに登場します。
　棚の上に隠れていたり、塀の上にいたり、クローゼットの中に隠れていることも。ぜひ探してみましょう。

・新しいグッズ "アンティークチェア" を追加しました

<English>
■VR 
Update of configuration items!
 - Free movement is now possible.
 - Snap turn is implemented.
 - The cat's name can be changed.
 - Daily Passwd function has been released.

■MR
 - A new "decor feature" has been added.


<日本語>
■VR 
・自由移動を実装しました
・スナップターンを実装しました
・ねこの名前を変えられるようになりました
・あいことばの入力ができるようになりました

■MR
・インテリア機能を実装しました

■VR/MR
To address the MATNA-75 issue temporarily, we have blocked the functionality of displaying the keyboard.
This workaround will persist until the system is updated and the MATNA-75 problem is resolved.

1. Section for changing the cat's name:
When selecting the function, a popup message is displayed.

2. Send button for Password on the Connect screen:
A popup message is displayed when the button is pressed. Subsequently, measures have been implemented to automatically transition to Password authentication.


Fixes
[Quest 3][VRC.Quest.Functional.3] The user will become Soft-Locked when changing a cat's name in the Catbook within the Yard and My Room. 
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-75

Known Issues:
N/A

■VR
Fixed render queue settings.(MATNA-58)
Corrected model update timing after HMD is attached.(MATNA-62)
Fixed an issue where titles would not pause while the Oculus Universal Menu was open.(MATNA-67)
Fixed a problem with the model display for hand tracking.(MATNA-68)
Fixed an issue where system processing callbacks were not working correctly.(MATNA-69)


Fixes
[Quest 2] [Quest 3] The user's hands will clip through the title's starting screen overlay when holding the hands too close to the HMD whilst using hand tracking within the Yard.
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-58

[Quest 2] [Quest 3] The food bowl will be visibly full instead of empty when returning to the HMD once letting the food bar deplete in the Yard.
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-62

[Quest 2] [Quest 3] [VRC.Quest.Functional.2] The title will not pause when opening the Oculus Universal Menu whilst the camera is open during gameplay.
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-67

[Quest 2] [Quest 3] Menus will not be visible behind the user's hands when using hand tracking during gameplay.
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-68

[Quest 2][Quest 3][VRC.Quest.Functional.3] The user will become Soft-Locked when stepping out of the stationary boundary and returning when progressing throughout setup in My Room. 
https://universallyspeaking.atlassian.net/browse/MATNA-69

Known Issues:
N/A
